subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Automatic conversion to short forms!
msgSnippet: Ewout, When I try opening the drivers, I get a message that asks what program do you want to open it with?  I have no idea.  What program do I want to open
messageBody:
Ewout,

When I try opening the drivers, I get a message that asks "what program do
you want to open it with?" I have no idea. What program do I want to open
it with. I guess I'm unclear what to do after double-clicking on the zip
file.

BTW, I think it would be great if you wrote your name in in Junior or Jerome
for us so we'd know how to pronounce it.


thanks,
Shalom v'Tovah,

Jon
http://surf.to/frimmin

It is more necessary to love much than to think much;
always do that which impels you most to love.

--St. Teresa of Avila, The Interior Castle
----- Original Message -----
From: "Ewout Stam" <teraiten@...>
To: "Read Alphabet" <Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, March 10, 2002 1:03 PM
Subject: [Read_Alphabet] Automatic conversion to short forms!


> Okay,
>
> I have not yet tested this driver, and I don't have the time to work on it
> now, so I'm releasing it to the group now so you can experiment and
bugfix.
>
> This is my NewRomaji-driver with built-in conversion to short/alternate
> forms (and special buttons).
>
> Please tell me what you think.
>
> Ewout
>
> To unsubscribe from this group, send an email to:
> Read_Alphabet-unsubscribe@egroups.com
>
>
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
